title: Primož Roglič Confirms Ambitious Giro d’Italia/Tour de France Double Campaign in 2025
content:
Vuelta a España winner Roglič to target cycling’s two other grand tours next season as part of Red Bull-Bora-Hansgrohe push for success.

Read the full article at Primož Roglič Confirms Ambitious Giro d’Italia/Tour de France Double Campaign in 2025 on Velo.
author: sstokes
